meanings.definition: Give (a book, movie, etc.) a new title.
meanings.sent1: She retitles the book with a more exciting name.
meanings.sent2: The author retitles the novel before publishing it.
meanings.sent3: He retitles the movie to confuse his friends for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist retitles her painting to reflect its true meaning.
meanings.sent5: The teacher retitles the assignment to make it more engaging.

meanings.definition: To change the title of something.
meanings.sent1: The librarian retitles the section for easier navigation.
meanings.sent2: I retitles my presentation to grab the audience's attention.
meanings.sent3: She retitles her pet cat for a day as a silly experiment.
meanings.sent4: The chef retitles the dish to attract more customers.
meanings.sent5: The student retitles the project to make it stand out.
